From: Marsh Events <no-reply-events@marsh.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-20 13:15
Subject: Registration confirmed - Multinational Risk Forum 2024
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Hagop,	 
Thank you for registering to attend the "Multinational Risk Forum 2024" event on Thursday, 21 November 2024 in Dubai. We are delighted to confirm your participation in this highly anticipated event.	 
Event Details	 
Date: Thursday, 21 November 2024

Time: 9:00 AM – 1:00 PM (Arabian Time)

Location: Sofitel Dubai Downtown
